ch.lambdaj.function.convert

Interface Converter<F,T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    StringConverter<F>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AliasedArgumentConverter, ArgumentConverter, ConstructorArgumentConverter, DefaultStringConverter, ProjectConverter, PropertyExtractor, StringLengthConverter, StringPropertyExtractor

    public interface Converter<F,T>
    Specifies how to convert from an object of type F to an object of type T
    Author:
    Mario Fusco

    • Method Summary

      T convert(F from)
      Converts from an object of type F to an object of type T

        Converts from an object of type F to an object of type T
        Parameters:

        Returns:
